website_summaries.verdict: Cats with sensitive stomachs and digestive issues should respond well to this gentle, high fiber dry food formula.
pros: Contains prebiotic fiber to improve digestion
High fiber content promotes healthy bowel movements
Balanced formula with 25 vitamins and minerals
cons: Some reports of severe diarrhea and allergic reactions

customer_reviews.title: No more cat barf on the rug!
customer_reviews.text: My cat has been a lifelong barfer. Every meal, every day. No matter what it was, he'd gobble down his food and then immediately throw it back up (usually on my good rug). The vet said he just had a sensitive stomach or maybe a food allergy. We tried food after food. I bought this stuff because nothing else seemed to make any difference. As usual, he gobbled it down, but this time no barfing! I waited two weeks before reviewing just in case it was a fluke (he's crafty like that) but he hasn't vomited since the food change. He also loves the taste, so happy cat AND happy person!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of my cats tends to have a very sensitive ...
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats tends to have a very sensitive stomach, so I used to only feed her the more expensive alternatives to combat this. I was very wary about using this product since I did not believe it would be an equivalent to those "vet recommended" choices. I am so pleasantly surprised that my cat can eat this wholeheartedly and not have any stomach issues. For those owners who have pets who tend towards runny poop (LOL), this has been a godsend for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cateye36Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: BAD Bag
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this food for years for my cat. The last bag I opened made her violently ill for days before I realized it was the NEW bag of food I opened. I immediately changed food, and she immediately stopped throwing up and got better. A few weeks later, the same EXACT thing happened to my dog (dog food obviously) Same exact dog food, bought off Amazon, opened a new bag... violently sick dog. Stopped using that bag, bought a new bag, same exact brand/food from a pet store- better dog. No more Amazon pet food or treats.
customer_reviews.author: Missy A

customer_reviews.title: THIS STUFF WORKS AND IS SO AFFORDABLE
customer_reviews.text: Started my cat on a more expensive food before finding this. He made the transition easily and is doing great on it! No stomach issues at all since starting and this is so much more affordable and was delivered so much more quickly! Highly recommend as he had been back and forth to the vet, even kept for a week since we got him in November and they couldn't figure out what was wrong with him. My daughter actually said maybe it's his stomach and ever since we switched him to Gentle/Sensitive Cat Food he is a completely different cat. No more vomiting or loose stools...best part, no more vet trips for him or bills for me!
customer_reviews.author: Jeni and Gary

customer_reviews.title: I bought a 13 pound bag of Purina Cat Chow ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 13 pound bag of Purina Cat Chow Gentle. When I opened the bag a few days after I had received it, the cat food was rotten and moldy. It smelled awful, and there was no way I could use it. So now I have to find a box, package it up, take it the UPS store, and send it back. I should be able to throw it in the trash and get my money back. I will never again buy cat food through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Gorhau

customer_reviews.title: Saved my cat
customer_reviews.text: I love this for our elderly cat who has developed a very sensitive stomach. She was becoming very thin and was vomiting. Many felt she was not going to last due to her age. We started using this and her eyes cleared, she was able to hold down her food, and she is much more active. I attribute her recovery to this food. Only drawback is, it is expensive online.
customer_reviews.author: HarleyKNM

customer_reviews.title: Easy...No more going into the big box store to have a the value I need. Delivered to my door...Easy, affordable...
customer_reviews.text: GREAT!!! My cat loves this food and it is not easy to find in this size bag...As my grandmother has become less mobile, getting her in and out of the car to go to a big box store to get the value has become too much...Being able to get this delivered to my house is now not only saving me the effort, but saving me the time and for the same money as in the store...Amazon Prime gets my delivery here within 2 days..One of my best online delivery finds of a monthly needed product. This is now my go to place to get the animal food portion of my monthly needs met.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for my two boys
customer_reviews.text: I swear by this food. I have two cats, one 12 year old who was throwing up after meals and having bathroom problems. After switching out his food a few different times I landed on this and won't go back. Both of my boys love eating it, and it's great for their digestive system. It definitely makes cleaning the litter box better than before.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: My Maine Coon has a BIG appetite but he's very picky
customer_reviews.text: My Maine Coon has a BIG appetite because he is big. About 25 lbs. Unfortunately, he's also very picky. He really likes this particular chow and none of it is wasted as so much has been up until now. He gets 1 can of wet catfood in the morning and I keep his bowl full of this for his all day and all night munchies. Yay! I finally found a wet brand he loves too. Now all I need is something to get my Cockatoo to eat vegetables!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Barwick

customer_reviews.title: My older cats like this food the best. The price is great.
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy to find a large bag of this particular cat food because the local stores only carry the 3.5 lb bags that cost about $6. This was a way better price and I don't have to buy multiple bags at a time. I have three cats (1,9,10 years old) and the older two seem to tolerate this specific kind more than any others I have bought for them, including expensive brands like Blue Buffalo. I'm so happy I found this and the cats really like it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: Our cats became really sick after we tried switching them over to this brand of cat food. One of our cats is really sick and at the vet's as we speak, not doing very well at all. Has anyone else had trouble with this food? Our cat had no pre-existing conditions and was completely healthy until we started this food.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Saved my kitties belly and my wallet.
customer_reviews.text: Our little gingers were having really bad stomach issues and an old-time vet we know recommended switching them from the super expensive specialty food they were in to this and all the troubles cleared up. We had spent over $500 on tests to figure out what was wrong with their bellies when all along they just needed a good quality food, not the high protein, grain free stuff that costs so much. Fan for life!
customer_reviews.author: Carl Schreiber

customer_reviews.title: Both cats seem to really like it. I feed each cat a handful twice ...
customer_reviews.text: I have two older cats (12 and 11 years old). One of them started throwing up their food at least once a day. I purchased this food on the advice of a friend and feed it to both cats. No more throwing up. Both cats seem to really like it. I feed each cat a handful twice a day and their dishes are always empty before the next feeding.
customer_reviews.author: cookiewookie

customer_reviews.title: Purina Cat Chow Gentle Adult Dry Cat Food
customer_reviews.text: DONT KNOW WHY THEY ARE ASKING ME TO RATE THIS ON FLAVOR...IT'S CAT FOOD. NONETHELESS, OUR CAT WON'T EAT ANYTHING ELSE FOR SEVERAL YEARS NOW...SOOOOO, THE CAT SAYS IT TASTES GREAT. WISH IT WAS LESS EXPENSIVE...BUT WE DO LIKE THE CAT...SO.... RLW RLW
customer_reviews.author: RLW

customer_reviews.title: At $13 was a great deal.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't taste to know if the taste is 5 star or not. That reflects the taste of my cat. I paid about $13 for it and this is my cat's favorite flavor. So at $13 was a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Paul L. Iversen

customer_reviews.title: SO FAR - SO GOOD !!  :)
customer_reviews.text: This is our first bag, but so far- so good!! My cat was eating a very expensive brand, but kept throwing up which is why we are trying this one. In addition to this dry food (the rec amount on bag), he gets (1) 3oz can of fancy feast chicken or seafood variety wet cat food - THE CLASSIC PATE ONLY. He seems very happy with this combination and is tolerating it well after a full week.
customer_reviews.author: Buttercup

customer_reviews.title: This gentle food is quite the opposite, it made ...
customer_reviews.text: This gentle food is quite the opposite, it made my fur babies spit up. Will not consider ever purchasing again. Awful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more lugging heavy bags!
customer_reviews.text: No more lugging heavy bags of cat chow. Let Amazon deliver it to my door! I recently switched my cats to "Gentle" formula Purina Cat Chow because one of the older cats was having digestive issues. All three of the cats like this formula and the older cat has stopped throwing up. With three cats, the little bags don't last long. My favorite store isn't carrying the large bag, so I checked on Amazon and found it at a reasonable price. Since I'm a Prime member, I even save on shipping. It's a great deal and a great way to make sure my "fur babies" never run out of food.
customer_reviews.author: MariaEdZed

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this food!
customer_reviews.text: This cat food is amazing. My 3, 8/9yr old indoor cats were constantly throwing up large wads of food and hairballs mutiple times a day. Now they very rarely get sick! I am so happy I found this gentle Purina, it's so much easier for them to digest and they seem to love the taste of it too. Happy healthy cats = happy owners. Not sure if it's food related, but they also seem to have shinier smoother coats also. I will keep buying, can't beat the price either.
customer_reviews.author: Waite

customer_reviews.title: works well with my cat that has digestive issues - IBSD
customer_reviews.text: This food is working well with my one cat who has a sensitive stomach. Was using Iams Sensitive (Pink bag) because it was the only one I could find on the market that addressed kitty diaherrea. This gentle formula, now that he has adjusted to it, works just as well on him at half the price.
customer_reviews.author: T Pray

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my older cat. The older he gets the more digestion issues he has. Switching to the gentle formula has stopped his vomiting and we are both very happy! I order it regularly on amazon because it’s hard to find in stores... and you can’t beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I'm a "food hopper"........I try to balance the Quality with the price. I'll stick with it at it's present $12 price point.......if it skyrockets , then it's on to something else. I find all Purina products to be pritty good, except the "natural's" which also has a good price point.....but my kitty can't keep it down, although she liked it. I free feed kibble........main food is always canned food.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive cats
customer_reviews.text: About a year ago i got an older cat from the local animal shelter. When I first got him he was constantly shedding, had diarrhea and throwing up every few days. After trying several different food brands i decided to try this one out and see how it worked. Since he started eating this food he no longer sheds nearly as bad or has nearly as many stomach problems as before, i'm very glad i was able to find an affordable option that helped him so much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A plus
customer_reviews.text: My cat has digestion problems and the food from the vet is $20 every two weeks. Definitely not affordable and this does the exact same thing. Very good for a cat that went from outdoor to indoor. Because it changes the digestive system this is great
customer_reviews.author: AMZIE143

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for those cats with sensitive stomachs. Every ...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for those cats with sensitive stomachs. Every cat food I tried gave my cat diarrhea and she was vomiting. This is the ONLY food I found where I have not had 1 problem since she's been on it. Die-hard​ fan for over a year and will remain so!
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette P.

customer_reviews.title: So relieved to see and expiration date in 2021!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in a retirement home so I've been getting extra litter and food for my senior cat. Thanks to Amazon and the vendors who sell their products on this site, my senior cat is all set for the next few months. And the expiration date is in 2021!
customer_reviews.author: Marcheta

customer_reviews.title: Both cats love it, Great for sensitive stomachs
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats has a very sensitive stomach and is fairly picky, and many foods make her throw-up, or she won't eat. The vet thinks she has IBD, and recommended lots of prescription foods. But our cat didn't like most of them, and they were super overpriced. Then we started giving her this food. She rarely throws this up, she loves the flavor, and it's cheap. Definitely a winning combination.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Purina, a name you can trust
customer_reviews.text: I have two older cats. One of them had a problem with throwing up. I don't mean the normal hair ball throwing up. I fed it to both and the one with the problem wouldn't eat it. I mixed the food with wet cat food and then she did and the throwing up stopped. I have to add both of these cats in their old age are so finicky! I have tried everything and I always end up with a product from Purina. Mixed with a bit of wet food and no more nasty messes.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Blue

customer_reviews.title: Happy Subscribe & Saver
customer_reviews.text: This is the only cat food we serve our cat (even though she has a nasty habit of throwing up all over the house at random times). I like getting this via Amazon because I don't have to lift the bag in the store, to the car, and back to the house. It is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: MrsKinsey

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on tender tummies
customer_reviews.text: We bought this locally when our cats began to have trouble with their previous food (don't want to be gross but they were bringing it back up). It has made a huge difference with our fourlegged furbabies. And they really seem to love the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: pebelz

customer_reviews.title: It's good, but could be better
customer_reviews.text: this cat food has made our cat very happy. she wouldn't be able to digest regular food, even the high quality expensive foods. this she keeps down and likes it! I know that the first ingredient is "turkey by-product meal, which means everything...and I mean everything, is ground up. But, it's the only food that she can keep down. I wish Purina would change the main ingredient to something better, but until then, we choose to stay with this food.
customer_reviews.author: maggie

customer_reviews.title: My cat doesn't throw up as much
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why I'm rating the flavor. I haven't eaten it myself, but my cat has, and she doesn't throw it up as much as most other foods. Soooo.... 5 stars for that.
customer_reviews.author: Dubbs

customer_reviews.title: My kitty likes it, and doesn't get sick after eating it!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased a lot of different cat foods. Usually I have to just go with whatever is the cheapest, but my kitty seems to have a sensitive stomach. He was getting sick too often after eating his other foods. This food seems great for him, he hasn't gotten sick since I started buying this gentle cat food. Also the price is very reasonable. I will continue to buy this food as long as he will keep eating it!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: The cats like it
customer_reviews.text: Really? Amazon asks how good the flavor is? As far as I can tell the cats like it just fine. I haven’t tried it myself. Expensive but has the highest protein and lowest filler content among standard dry cat foods, so I keep buying it.
customer_reviews.author: N. Vollrath

customer_reviews.title: cats are mostly color blind anyway!
customer_reviews.text: This cat food is great. My cat has always had a stomach problem and threw up frequently. Early on I diagnosed the problem as sensitivity to the various dyes added to pet food. Since starting the Gentle formula, which she really likes and eats with relish, she has not vomited once. This is really excellent cat food - a good investment for your cat and your housekeeping.
customer_reviews.author: Deedra Chaney

customer_reviews.title: really helps stomach sensitively.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 long hair indoor cats. They both have a tendency to throw up. This food has made my life so much easier. It was several times a week, out came the carpet spot cleaner. I can honestly say, 95% of the problem is gone. I do use hairball control treats and brush daily, but with this dry food, it is a winning trifecta.
customer_reviews.author: Clark

customer_reviews.title: but my cats didn't like it. I think it looks like very good ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know whether it was my cats or the cat chow, but my cats didn't like it. I think it looks like very good quality cat food, so I definitely can't blame Purina. I trust Purina completely. I think the Cat Chow Gentle probably tastes too bland for Butch and Posey. The little rascals can't tell me, and I am not about to taste it myself!
customer_reviews.author: Judith H.

customer_reviews.title: Less Vomit - I mean, you want the truth, right?
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 cats. When it comes to dry food, they're not too picky, but they've always been on Purina Cat Chow (originally Kitten Chow). I switched them over to Gentle about a year ago and within a few weeks noticed that the hairball and other vomit related incidents have been cut by probably 90%. They love the stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Diversified Company

customer_reviews.title: I always keep a bowl out by my bed for late night cat snacks
customer_reviews.text: I always keep a bowl out for late night cat snacks. My cats refuse to eat unless a human is with them. They bat my head if I don't get up and feed them. I keep a bowl by my bed. Luckily, I am able to use Amazon Alexa to turn on the light then point to the bowl and tell them to eat so I can then tell Alexa to turn off the light and go back to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great easy way to get the cats their food! I can ensure my cats are getting their favored kind of food that will always be in stock for them, unlike at the store. Subscription purchase.
customer_reviews.author: courtney alberts

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good product and flavor... My cats seem to enjoy it
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bailey

customer_reviews.title: No more vomit
customer_reviews.text: My cats all have sensitive stomachs. This food is one of the few that actually stop the vomiting- thank goodness!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Skowneski

customer_reviews.title: All 7 cats can eat it!  Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: I have 7 spoiled fur babies ranging from 3 to 17 yrs old. Since using this gentle version they all really like it...tolerate it well...and aren't constantly battling fur balls and throwing up. In fact...very seldom. Good deal for this 13 lb size bag, on Prime, delivered to my door.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri

customer_reviews.title: Purina
customer_reviews.text: I can’t comment on the taste, but my kitties eat the stuff. My baby girl has inflammatory bowel disease and needs a special dry food. She tolerates Purina fairly well.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R

customer_reviews.title: Great big bag of food that cats enjoy
customer_reviews.text: A huge bag that lasts forever for feeding the outdoor community of cats in my neighborhood. They like the taste and I like the price. I feed my own cats something different and pricier but this is great for the outdoor kitties who I can't afford to feed luxury foods, and on rare occasion I will let my indoor cats have a nibble for a treat.
customer_reviews.author: PTSDiva

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Cat has a slow moving GI. After much medication and other attempts, this seems to have helped alleviate most of his problems. Both my cats like this better than other brand of food. Amazon's price was great and delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Duane P

customer_reviews.title: I love it and so does my feline
customer_reviews.text: My Balinese has a sensitive belly. Almost all cat foods make her vomit. Not this, though! I've been buying this Gentle brand for well over a year. I love it and so does my feline. :)
customer_reviews.author: CasLA

customer_reviews.title: Answer to throwing up! Yay!
customer_reviews.text: Great for cats with sensitive tummies. My baby with a sensitive tummy has almost stopped throwing up (save for hairballs). I hope they never discontinue this formula. I just wish they would make it in a bigger bag. Third world problems. *sigh*
customer_reviews.author: drkat

customer_reviews.title: Good Cat Food
customer_reviews.text: We are experimenting with new food for my 19 year old cat. She likes it.

customer_reviews.title: They like it and its easy for the small ones to ...
customer_reviews.text: My cats range from seven to one, large and mini sized. I was using the naturals formula and they were doing well but there were still tummy upsets. Since I tried this, no tummy problems. They like it and its easy for the small ones to eat. I'm very pleased with the way they have reacted. I would like to be able to get a larger sack.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: No more barfing and he loves it! Don't waste your money anywhere else! I tried tons of other foods, mostly expensive, none of them stopped the barfing and most of them smelled like a fish market gone awry. This even smells okay.....ssoooo glad I found it :)
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie P.

customer_reviews.title: Helps with tummy problems!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is a vomit machine. However, this helps a lot. The only one that works better is $55 for six pounds and I have three cats so that is not possible with our fixed income.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this formula
customer_reviews.text: My 1 cat has terrible allergies and has been doing so well since we switched to this formula! Both of my cats love it and this price is the same as Walmart so it’s grest having it shipped right to the house!

customer_reviews.title: ... new attitude I can really tell she is feeling better! No more getting sick and her stool is ...

customer_reviews.title: Seems to help
customer_reviews.text: I have three cats so don't know whether one or more were throwing up. Since trying this, there have been a lot fewer incidents. Can't find easily in brick and mortar stores. It's not expensive. So this is my go- to for dry food.

customer_reviews.text: This is literally, and I'm not kidding, the ONLY food my cat will eat. It was tremendous in helping her GI issues, and I tried to get her prescription cat food for the GI tract and she refused to eat it, would pick through it to find the pieces of Purina. She finally just sat at the bowl and meowed at me and made me separate it for her. So yeah, I think she approves.

customer_reviews.title: The Only Food My Cats Can Eat

customer_reviews.title: Purina Gentle

I reaad the reviews and thought this was worth trying. Both cats LOVE the food and the cat with the food sensitivities hasn't had any issues since we started her on this version. customer_reviews.title: The best dried cat food ever
customer_reviews.text: My cats all, without exception, love this cat food. It has been a tremendous help for one of my cats who had a difficult time keeping down her food. It also smells much better than the oilier dried cat food I used to purchase. i will use this from now on.

customer_reviews.title: Good cat chow.
customer_reviews.text: My cats like it so far. I will update review if anything changes.

customer_reviews.title: A Great Brand
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this cat food from Walmart for our cats for a long time, but to be able to have it delivered for near the same price is great. Quality was the same as always, and this brand helps our cats from throwing up. Overall a great buy

customer_reviews.title: we have three indoor cats, sassy, baby, ...
customer_reviews.text: we have three indoor cats, sassy, baby, and sammie. we are also feeding the five feral cats that seem to know we feed all cats. we go through three bags of purina gentle and about twelve cans of fancy feast grilled chicken in gravy. our friends sya we are crazy for doing these, but some has to take care of the homeless cats.

customer_reviews.text: Good value for the size of the bag. My cats like the flavor, and I don't have to carry the bag from the store, just from my front door!

customer_reviews.title: I can't say I love it, but my cats do
customer_reviews.text: I can't say I love it, but my cats do. My blind kitty has a sensitive stomach and this seems to be the only one that works for her and her digestive system. So I will stick to it!

customer_reviews.title: Yup
customer_reviews.text: Typical dry cat food... not good for them but when you have tons of fosters to feed you get desperate. If feeding this dry food or any dry food make sure to feed some form of wet food daily with ADDED WATER cats do not drink enough water and feeding just dry food can lead to urinary issues more so in male cats.

customer_reviews.title: ... foods I've tried that seem to make my cat happy. No vomiting so far
customer_reviews.text: One of the few cat foods I've tried that seem to make my cat happy. No vomiting so far, fingers crossed. I have tried all the major brands and here I am back to Purina. Its also small than most of the other kibble I've tried and I think that makes it easier to eat and digest.

customer_reviews.title: Off market
customer_reviews.text: Amazing they would take it off the market. It’s very difficult to get a cat to CHANGE food.

customer_reviews.title: Glad it works for others
customer_reviews.text: Have tried using this for several months but my cats still throw up. Glad it works for others, but I will not be buying again for my cats.
customer_reviews.author: Davis Day Trips LLC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for finicky cats and sensitive stomachs
customer_reviews.text: This catfood is excellent for our older cat and our younger cat with skin issues. It really keeps down the fur balls and issues with finding little throw up surprises in your house. Plus there's the benefit of not having to lug it in from the car. Just open the front door and get it off my porch!
customer_reviews.author: Reading since 9

customer_reviews.title: Great for cats with queezy tummies & GREAT VALUE!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dry cat food I've found for my kitties. One of my cats has a queezy stomach and this product has been my go-to for years! It is easy on her stomach and she loves the taste! This is a huge bag as well, 13 lb bag lasts us about 1 1/2 months! That is for 2 cats! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Best for an old cat or any cat
customer_reviews.text: I have an old cat whose tummy was messed up and she wouldn't eat and she also started to poop in various places. I tried everything and found Purina Cat Gentle and now she is acting like a kitty again. At 17 yrs old she is prancing here :)
customer_reviews.author: quita

customer_reviews.title: Great for them
customer_reviews.text: This product saved my cat from having to have special food from the vet. She always seemed to have digestive problems. As soon as she started this, it all went away.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: My cat likes this. It's not expeniavw like the iams food. The tidbits aren't multicolored like lots of cat food. The red ones makes her barf so god knows what's in it. This is definitely a gentle cat food. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: We love it! this is the biggest size they make ...
customer_reviews.text: We have a puker in our house and this is the only reasonably priced food that keeps her from upchucking. We love it! this is the biggest size they make it in and Amazon has a great price. Convenient to have it delivered right to my door. Great buy overall.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Great product... But they’ve doubled the price... Not good!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and the only thing my cat will eat. However I would like to know why the price has doubled since the last time I purchased it? That is totally unreasonable!
customer_reviews.author: kyakr44

customer_reviews.title: no more digestive issues in 4 cats
customer_reviews.text: if you want your cats to stop puking Buy This! (& some hairball remedy)...I have 4 cats and all love it. it has a rounded flowery or star shape. No artificial colors that cause digestive issues. Try this before you spend the big bucks on expensive stuff.
customer_reviews.author: J. LeClear

customer_reviews.title: This food within two days made the stomach issues go away and both the cats love it. It's a much better price then other ...
customer_reviews.text: Both my cats have sensitive stomaches. This food within two days made the stomach issues go away and both the cats love it. It's a much better price then other brands that have similar results.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: My Cats Love This Cat Food
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if this taste good or not, But my cats Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lavender Lady

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: I was really concerned about this product working until I followed the instructions on the package. After the second day no more cleaning up vomit from two of the three cats. The third one never had the issue to begin with. I would recommend to anyone having a cat, or cats, with sensitive tummies.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Williams

customer_reviews.title: Kitties love it
customer_reviews.text: The girls love this flavor. I will be back fir another bag soon
customer_reviews.author: Peaceful_Inhaler

customer_reviews.title: I am sure it would be good to other cats
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cat food for my older cat and he didn't eat much of it. I am sure it would be good to other cats, mine is very picky. I donated this bag of cat food to the rescue center and they were very thankful.
customer_reviews.author: Neva Miller

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Food!!!
customer_reviews.text: We were struggling with our cats vomiting. We were using Iams food, which is more expensive. We decided to try this cat food and thank goodness our cats no longer have the same issues with their stomachs! And the price is unbeatable!
customer_reviews.author: Madcat Magick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best cat food I've found for my cats sensation stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My cat was getting sick after eating her regular food more and more frequently. I decided to use this brand especially since it claims to be Gentle. I must say I was very pleased and judging from how well my cat seemed after eating it, she was pleased as well.
customer_reviews.author: L. Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great formula
customer_reviews.text: We have a senior cat that was getting sick a lot from both the Complete and Indoor formulas and I was getting ready to try another brand actually when this formula became available so I gave it a shot. He has done much better with this formula and has way fewer digestion issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: KDE

customer_reviews.title: Great for the cost
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 cats, one of which has a very sensitive stomach. Since switching to this food,he has had a lot fewer upset stomachs. Great for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: just another pretty face

customer_reviews.title: Cats seemed to enjoy it
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to tell with the murderous beasts that my daughter keeps as pets but I think they appeared to enjoy this. It didn't make them sick and their bowls were always empty after each feed.
customer_reviews.author: Cosala Salaci

customer_reviews.title: and the young ones do just fine on it as well
customer_reviews.text: My oldest cat was throwing up the regular cat food, so I switched the entire gang to this. Miss Elderly is no longer barfing, and the young ones do just fine on it as well!

customer_reviews.title: It make Katrina Happy. And like all cats she is very discerning
customer_reviews.text: It make Katrina Happy. And like all cats she is very discerning.

customer_reviews.title: My fur babies love it. They're inside cats and help with digestion
customer_reviews.text: My fur babies love it. They're inside cats and help with digestion. I see less spit ups. Packaging however, was not good. Both bags in one box. When received both tops and bottom of box were partially open and bags were falling out.
customer_reviews.author: ALICIA CMEHIL

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the only food my cats can eat that does not make them sick. We've tried everything from the most expensive to the cheapest and this is the one that works for us.
customer_reviews.author: LeleR

customer_reviews.title: I like it but the cats don't
customer_reviews.text: I like it but the cats don't! I have to "sweeten the pot" with a can to get them to eat this so I think it's cancelling the good effect of easy digestion. If your cat likes it, go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Auntietta

customer_reviews.title: I have a few cats and this is one of ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a few cats and this is one of their favorites. I keep this on Amazon's Subscribe & Save so I never run out!
customer_reviews.author: Sharris

customer_reviews.title: Only buying Purina Gentle
customer_reviews.text: We tried going with a different type of Purina brand of cat food because our grocery store doesn't carry the Gentle....oh that was a mistake! Poor kitties! Never making that mistake again. When they are on this there is no more puking and it's gentle enough for my senior cat too.
customer_reviews.author: Slevin

product_meta.title: Purina Cat Chow Gentle Adult Dry Cat Food
product_meta.description: Size:13 lb. Bag| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingServe up the nutrition your cat deserves with Purina Cat Chow Gentle adult dry cat food. Our formula is made with high-quality protein, including real turkey, for a delicious meal that is specially formulated for easy digestion. This recipe doesn't compromise on nutrition or taste. It includes all 25 essential vitamins and minerals to provide 100% complete and balanced nutrition, helping to support your adult cat's overall health and well-being. Natural prebiotic fiber in this dry cat food helps promote digestive health. We also don't add any artificial colors, and this pet food is manufactured with care right here in the USA. Purina Cat Chow Gentle adult dry cat food offers your feline friend the taste she loves and the high-quality care you love. So go ahead and fill your cat's bowl with a recipe that you can feel good about every day while helping to support her digestive health at every meal.
feature_bullets: One (1) 13 lb. Bag - Purina Cat Chow Sensitive Stomach Dry Cat Food, Gentle
Natural fiber blend helps support digestive health
Provides all 25 essential vitamins and minerals to support her overall well-being
100% complete and balanced nutrition for adult cats
No Added Artificial Flavors or Preservatives
High in Protein Like a Cat's Natural Diet
Natural Fiber Blend Helps Control Hairballs
100% Complete & Balanced Formula for Adult Cats
